00067 class KVIRC_API KviKvsPopupMenuItem
00068 {
00069         friend class KviKvsPopupMenu;
00070 public:
00071         enum Type { Item , Menu , Label , Separator , ExtMenu };
00072 protected:
00073         KviKvsPopupMenuItem(Type t,const QString &szItemName,const QString &szCondition);
00074         KviKvsPopupMenuItem(Type t,const QString &szItemName,const KviKvsScript * pCondition);
00075 public:
00076         virtual ~KviKvsPopupMenuItem();
00077 protected:
00078         QString        m_szItemName;
00079         Type           m_eType;
00080         KviKvsScript * m_pKvsCondition;
00081 public:
00082         // this doesn't trigger errors, only warnings
00083         bool evaluateCondition(KviKvsPopupMenuTopLevelData * pData);
00084 
00085         KviKvsPopupMenuItem::Type type(){ return m_eType; };
00086 
00087         const QString & name(){ return m_szItemName; };
00088 
00089         bool isItem(){ return m_eType == Item; };
00090         bool isSeparator(){ return m_eType == Separator; };
00091         bool isLabel(){ return m_eType == Label; };
00092         bool isExtMenu(){ return m_eType == ExtMenu; };
00093         bool isMenu(){ return m_eType == Menu; };
00094 
00095         KviKvsScript * kvsCondition(){ return m_pKvsCondition; };
00096         virtual KviKvsScript * kvsIcon();
00097         virtual KviKvsScript * kvsText();
00098         virtual KviKvsScript * kvsCode();
00099 
00100 
00101         virtual void fill(KviKvsPopupMenu * pMenu,KviKvsPopupMenuTopLevelData * pData,int iIdx) = 0;
00102         virtual void clear();
00103         virtual KviKvsPopupMenuItem * clone() const = 0;
00104 };
